test.QuesText: Do AngularJS provide reusable components?
Which of the following is true about lowercase filter?
test.Opt1: Lowercase filter converts a text to lower case text
test.Opt2: Lowercase filter is a function which takes text as input.

test.QuesText: Which of the following is true about orderby filter?
test.Opt1: orderby filter orders the array based on provided criteria
test.Opt2: orderby filter is used to filter the array to a subset of it based on provided criteria.

test.QuesText: $rootScope is the parent of all of the scope variables.
Which components can be injected as a dependency in AngularJS?
AngularJS supports inbuilt internationalization for three types of filters currency, date and numbers.
AngularJS applications can run on all major browsers and smart phones including Android and iOS based phones/tablets.
AngularJS Expressions are not written inside double braces like {{ expression}}.
In controllers, model data is accessed via $scope object.
Which of the following is true about ng-model directive?
test.Opt1: ng-model directive binds the values of AngularJS application data to HTML input controls
test.Opt2: ng-model directive creates a model variable which can be used with the html page and within the container control having ng-app directive.

test.QuesText: AngularJS application expressions are partial JavaScript expressions.
angular.module is primarily used to create application module.
factory method is used to define a factory which can later be used to create services as and when required.
AngularJS Expressions are used to bind application data to model.
novalidate with a form declaration disables any browser specific validation.
Which of the following is not a core AngularJS directive.
Which of the following is true about $routeProvider?
test.Opt1: $routeProvider is the key service which set the configuration of urls.
test.Opt2: $routeProvider maps Urls with the corresponding html page or ng-template.
test.Opt3: $routeProvider attaches a controller with the view.

test.QuesText: Which of the following is true about AngularJS service?
test.Opt2: Services are responsible to do specific tasks only
test.Opt3: Inbuilt services are always prefixed with $ symbol

test.QuesText: Templates are the rendered view with information from the controller and model.
Each controller accepts $scope as a parameter which refers to the application/module that controller is to control.
